articles.author: ESPN Esports Staff
articles.title: Evo 2020 - What happened to the biggest fighting game tournament of the year - ESPN
articles.description: After sexual misconduct allegations against Evo co-founder Joey "MrWizard" Cuellar became public, competitors, teams and game developers began dropping out of Evo 2020. Here's a look back at the events that led up to the tournament's cancellation.
articles.content: The Evolution Championship Series (Evo) is the largest annual event in the fighting game community and largest LAN event in the world. It had been held every year since 1996 until this year. On Thurs… [+4266 chars]
